name: BatchOS
description:
BatchOS is a Cool and Neat little Batch Game i Made in CMD and Notepad. It will Use 3rd Party Apps. But better with it.  You can download it Right Now to try and see if my Batch or CMD Game Project is good. If it isn't. That's No Suprise. I have already done this Project and have already released other versions but this is just ported to Itch.io. If you want you can download from my Website. you can die by cringe tho.

See you Guys!
